name: Creative69
description:
| Creative69 | - We are a full service creative agency with expertise across the spectrum. From branding, retail design, and visual merchandising, to digital content, social media, customer engagement and activation - we believe that everything can be better, which is why we do what we do.
Our in-House Services Include:
1) Digital Marketing
Strategy consulting
SEO (Search engine optimisation)
Paid advertising on search, social, display and mobile for lead generation and eCommerce sales
Inbound and content marketing
Social Media Marketing
Design, development and maintenance of apps and websites
Conversion rate optimization
Digital media buying
Branding and engagement campaigns
Apps Store Optimisation
2) Web Design 
3) Mobile App Development
